snippet: The Internet retailer took in almost $1 billion less than analysts expected in the fourth quarter, sending its shares down sharply after hours. Read more »
abstract: The Internet retailer took in almost $1 billion less than analysts expected in the fourth quarter, sending its shares down sharply after hours. Read more »
lead_paragraph: Amazon.com, the Internet retailer, took in almost $1 billion less than analysts expected in the fourth quarter, sending its shares down sharply after hours. Read more »

headline.main: Amazon's Shares Fall as Revenue Disappoints
